    Methods in ca.hedlund.jpraat.binding.fon that return Pitch
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Pitch Pitch.create​(double tmin, double tmax, long nt, double dt, double t1, double ceiling, long maxnCandidates)
    Function: create an empty pitch contour (voiceless), or NULL if out of memory.
    Pitch Pitch.interpolate()  
    Pitch Pitch.killOctaveJumps()
    Add octave jumps so that every pitch step, including those across unvoiced frames, does not exceed 1/2 octave.
    Pitch Pitch.smooth​(double bandWidth)  
    Pitch Pitch.subtractLinearFit​(kPitch_unit unit)

    void Pitch.difference​(Pitch thee)
    give information about frames that are different in me and thee.
